body: Hey! So I am considering upgrading to Emerald, but it says the cost will be $50. I think it's supposed to be $25 since I'm Gold already, but it doesn't say anything about that. Thank you!
body_tagged: Hey! So I am considering upgrading to Emerald, but it says the cost will be $50. I think it's supposed to be $25 since I'm Gold already, but it doesn't say anything about that. Thank you!
title: Upgrading to Emerald

replies.body: I think there is a way to get an upgrade somehow... but I don't remember.
replies.body_tagged: I think there is a way to get an upgrade somehow... but I don't remember.

replies.body: Correct me if I'm am wrong, but I believe all you have to do is buy Gold again, and tell a Sr Staff member to upgrade you.
replies.body_tagged: Correct me if I'm am wrong, but I believe all you have to do is buy Gold again, and tell a Sr Staff member to upgrade you.

replies.body: Yup, what Tarh said. If you purchase another Gold rank, just ask for a Sr Staff member to combine them into an Emerald.
replies.body_tagged: Yup, what Tarh said. If you purchase another Gold rank, just ask for a Sr Staff member to combine them into an Emerald.

replies.body:
Go here, sign in, and it should automatically reduce the price.

http://shop.avicus.net/category/91495
replies.body_tagged:
Go here, sign in, and it should automatically reduce the price.

http://shop.avicus.net/category/91495

reply_to.body: Yup, what Tarh said. If you purchase another Gold rank, just ask for a Sr Staff member to combine them into an Emerald.
reply_to.body_tagged: Yup, what Tarh said. If you purchase another Gold rank, just ask for a Sr Staff member to combine them into an Emerald.

replies.body: Even though it says its $50 it really isn't. However you decide to pay it will come up with a message that says that you won't have to pay full price. I'd you have any questions you can always contact a staff member and we would be willing to guide you through the process. This would be a good way to use the TS support rooms. :]
